EXPERIMENT.TITLE: TARGET Osteosarcoma Subject TARGET-40-0A4HY5 Primary Solid Tumor Whole Genome Sequence

DESIGN.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Whole genome sequence analysis of TARGET-40-0A4HY5-01A-01D.

LIBRARY_DESCRIPTOR.LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL: Genomic DNA was isolated using the Qiagen AllPrep Kit. Whole genome sequencing libraries were prepared using either Illumina's Genomic DNA Sample Prep starting with 1 mcg genomic DNA or the Illumina Nextera DNA Library Prep Kit according to the manufacturer's protocol.
